Members and Term Limits
=======================

Planning Board    
  

|  |  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **Member** | **Class** | **Term of Office** | **Original Appointment Date** |
| William Giegerich (Designee) | Class I Member-Mayor | 1/1/26-12/31/26   1 year | Annual Appointment   Changes Yearly |
| Meredith Riculfy | Class II Member- Manager | 1/1/26-12/31/26   1 year | 1/3/17 |
| Dr. Curtis Green | Class III Member- Council | 1/1/26-12/31/26   1 year | Annual Appointment   Changes Yearly |
| Richard Bathke | Class IV Member | 1/1/25-12/31/28  4 year term | 1/1/21 |
| Ronald Lieberman | Class IV Member | 1/1/23-12/31/26 4 year term | 1/1/23 |
| Antonio Sorrentino | Class IV Member | 1/1/24-12/31/27   4 year term | 6/13/23 |
| Atif Ahmad | Class IV Member | 1/1/26-12/31/29    4 year term | 9/1/24 |
| Michael Pfeiffer | Class IV Member | 1/1/24-12/31/27    4 year term | 1/1/20 |
| Joy Stewart | Class IV Member | 1/1/26-12/31/27  2 year term | 1/1/26 |
| Christopher Lovato | Class IV Member | 1/1/26-12/31/29  4 year term | 1/1/24 |
| Open Position | Class IV Member | 1/1/26-12/31/27 2 year term |  |
